commands.title: Git: Initialize repository
commands.description: Initialize a new Git repository in the current directory

commands.title: Git: Clone repository
commands.description: Clone a remote repository to your local machine

commands.title: Git: Check status
commands.description: Show the working tree status - modified files, staged changes, etc.

commands.title: Git: Stage all changes
commands.description: Stage all modified and new files for commit

commands.title: Git: Commit with message
commands.description: Commit staged changes with a descriptive message

commands.title: Git: Push to remote
commands.description: Push commits from local branch to remote repository

commands.title: Git: Pull latest changes
commands.description: Fetch and merge changes from remote branch

commands.title: Git: Create new branch
commands.description: Create and switch to a new branch

commands.title: Git: Undo last commit (keep changes)
commands.description: Undo the last commit but keep changes staged - useful if you need to modify the commit

commands.title: Git: Interactive rebase
commands.description: Interactively rebase last N commits - allows squashing, reordering, or editing commits

commands.title: Git: Stash changes
commands.description: Temporarily save uncommitted changes without committing

commands.title: Git: Apply stashed changes
commands.description: Reapply most recent stashed changes and remove from stash list

commands.title: Git: View commit history
commands.description: Show commit history with branch graph in compact format

commands.title: Git: Force push with lease
commands.description: Safer force push - only pushes if remote hasn't changed since last fetch
